page.title: 07MORDIFORD CHURCH
page.content: There is a single church within the D-Block situated in the village of Mordiford. A single service is held every Sunday by the vicar although additional services are conducted on Christmas Day, Good Friday and Easter Day. The church enjoys a regular attendance at these services but it is regarded by most only as a place to be Christened,married and buried in. The Rev. McDonald has been priest in charge for 15 years but is now retiring and it is not known as yet who will take his place. The choir is made up primarily of adults although a number of children are also members. It is said to be very good. The parishioners are involved with the Church in many ways including meetings of the P.C.C., fetes and sales in aid of Church Funds.
